mapper.select: SELECT rid, uid, sid, today_or_tomorrow, buy_or_sell, trade_timing_type, in_or_exit, order_by FROM trade_rules WHERE uid = #{uid} AND rid = #{rid}

SELECT tr.rid, tr.uid, tr.sid, tr.today_or_tomorrow, tr.buy_or_sell, tr.trade_timing_type, tr.in_or_exit, tr.order_by r_order, tsp.pid, tsp.left_joint_type, tsp.right_joint_type, tsp.nest_open, tsp.nest_close, tsp.order_by p_order, tsc.cid, tsc.label, tsc.used, tsc.card_type, tsc.left_side_days, tsc.left_side_indicator_type, tsc.right_side_days, tsc.right_side_indicator_type, tsc.right_side_fix_or_flex, tsc.right_side_fix_value, tsc.coefficient, tsc.comparison_type FROM trade_rules tr INNER JOIN trade_strategy_palettes tsp ON tr.rid = tsp.rid LEFT JOIN trade_strategy_cards tsc ON tsp.pid = tsc.pid WHERE tr.uid = #{uid} AND tr.sid = #{sid} AND tr.in_or_exit = #{inOrExit} ORDER BY tr.order_by, tsp.order_by
